name: Lana Jett
description:
In this gripping action-platformer set in the far reaches of space, you play as Lana Jett, a ruthless hunter from the twelfth dimension. Collect gems and battle an array of bad guys on Lana Jett's inaugural adventure!

  • 15 levels of space platforming madness.
  • Various collectable weapons.
  • Toe-tapping original soundtrack.
